episodes.title: Part 1
episodes.description: The German U-Boat crew embarks on its mission at the beginning of World War II.

episodes.title: Part 2
episodes.description: The crew is trying to carry out its mission which has proven to be extremely difficult.

episodes.title: Part 3
episodes.description: For almost four weeks, the submarine is traveling south-west of Ireland and is held underwater by a destroyer during its first attack on an English convoy. Exploding depth charges hurl the crew and submarine into chaos.
